subject: Attention!
body:
Attention!
This is. Mr  john Kelly i am contacting you from the Department of the
State Government of America to notify you.
Congratulations to you and your household, you have been selected
among the nation that will earn 8.5 million Dollars, each; however,
this Compensation fund is coming to you from the United Nations
financial institution as a result of Corona virus AIDS. We want you to
choose the below options on how to claim your funds as we acknowledge.
Options (1) Mail of ATM Card: Service fee $150 dollars only;
Options (2) Mail of Check: Service fee $200 dollars only;
Options (3) Bank to Bank Transfer: Service fee $110 dollars only;
Choose one of the options you prefer to have your fund and you have 48
hours to make the payment. Inquire how to send the service fee and
you'll be directly on how to send it to us so that we can proceed to
ensure that you receive your fund as we all agree?
the managing director of cancellation inheritance funds
Name : Mr john Kelly

subject: Re: Attention!
body:
Dear Mr. John Kelly,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to receive this fund. I would like to choose the Bank to Bank Transfer option. Could you please provide me with more details on how to proceed with the payment of the service fee?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Homer
